inlineContent.text: : Users accidentally trigger the same action twice
: Multiple network requests competing and overwriting each other
: Heavy operations blocking the UI or consuming too much memory
: Actions completing out of order and corrupting app state

code: // This prevents double-tapping the save button

inlineContent.text: Lockman provides a comprehensive solution for managing exclusive control over user actions in applications built with The Composable Architecture (TCA). It offers various strategies to handle exclusive operations, prevent duplicate executions, and maintain consistent application state.

abstract.text: Elegant exclusive control for user actions in The Composable Architecture applications.
Strategy that limits the number of concurrent executions per concurrency group.

lock strategies using type erasure and flexible identifiers.
